description: Datacenter-level supply inventory containing total power, available power, raised floor space, operational status, internal/external flag, provider, and regional attributes.
calculated_metrics: TotalDeployed; AvailableDeployed; UnderConstructionPower; Land; LiveInventory; VacantInventory; LiveRaisedSpace; VacantRaisedSpace; TotalCurrentMarketPower; CurrentMarketSharePower; TotalFutureMarketPower; FutureMarketSharePower;TotalPowerUtilized;OccupiedPowerMarketShare; MarketSharePower;TotalCurrentMarketSpace; CurrentMarketShareSpace; TotalFutureMarketSpace; FutureMarketShareSpace; AvailableMarketSpace; OccupiedSpaceMarketShare; MarketShareSpace

description: Quarterly regional supply dataset containing quarter-over-quarter changes in power and market-level percentage metrics.
calculated_metrics: Total Deployed QoQ; Available Deployed QoQ; Underconstruction QoQ; Land QoQ; Total Deployed QoQ percent; Available Deployed QoQ percent; Underconstruction QoQ percent; Land QoQ percent

description: Quarterly regional demand dataset containing quarter-over-quarter changes in inventory and raised floor space metrics.
calculated_metrics: Live Inventory QoQ; Vacant Inventory QoQ; Live raised space QoQ; Vacant raised space QoQ; Live Inventory QoQ percent; Vacant Inventory QoQ percent; Live raised space QoQ percent; Vacant raised space QoQ percent

column4: and provider details across business regions"

description: Long-term supply forecast dataset containing historical, current, and forward-looking power and space projections with CAGR metrics by geography and property type.
